pages.text: $(marked)Snakes$() usually appear in $(marked)savannas$(), $(marked)deserts$() and $(marked)plains$(), where they prey on other animals, killing them with their venom. $(br2)Snakes may drop their $(item)Snake Tongue$(), which is commonly used in witchcraft (though it may also be acquired from some demonic entities).

Snakes can be $(l:bewitchment:rituals/binding)$(marked)familiars$(). Witches with a Snake familiar are able to craft much more durable $(l:bewitchment:sigils/using_sigils)$(marked)sigils$(). Additionally they benefit from $(marked)poison$(); it does not harm them and refills their internal $(marked)ME buffer$().
Snakes can be tamed with $(item)Raw Rabbit$(), and bred with $(item)Raw Chicken$().
